translations: n.[机]附件；附着物；附属装置（attachment 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 阀值；附着点；附保点；接合点

sentences.sentence: Some models come with attachments for dusting.
sentences.translation: 一些模型带有附加的除尘装置。

sentences.sentence: They had to check the strength of the seat attachments to the floor of the plane.
sentences.translation: 他们需要检查座椅与飞机舱面固定接头的强度。
